Conditional Mutual Information Based Feature Selection Filter

Source: R/FilterMIM.R

Conditional mutual information based feature selection filter. Calls praznik::MIM().

FilterMIM

Format

R6::R6Class inheriting from Filter.

See also

Other Filter: Filter, mlr_filters_auc, mlr_filters_cmim, mlr_filters_disr, mlr_filters_gain_ratio, mlr_filters_information_gain, mlr_filters_jmim, mlr_filters_jmi, mlr_filters_kruskal_test, mlr_filters_linear_correlation, mlr_filters_njmim, mlr_filters_rank_correlation, mlr_filters_symmetrical_uncertainty, mlr_filters_variance, mlr_filters

Examples

task = mlr3::mlr_tasks$get("iris")
filter = FilterMIM$new()
filter$calculate(task)
head(as.data.table(filter), 3)
#>            name     value
#> 1:  Petal.Width 0.9893676
#> 2: Petal.Length 0.9364614
#> 3: Sepal.Length 0.5059308
